title: Expand Valentine letter content to ~500 words

requirements.summary: Update the Valentine invitation letter body to a single cohesive heartfelt ~500-word English letter while keeping the final “Will you be my Valentine?” line exactly and visually prominent, without breaking the existing reveal animations.
acceptanceCriteria: The rendered letter body (excluding the final “Will you be my Valentine?” headline) is approximately 500 words (acceptable range: 450–550).
The letter remains romantic and suitable for asking the user’s girlfriend to be their Valentine.
The existing animated line/letter reveal behavior still works (no broken layout, no missing text).
The final main question text remains exactly: “Will you be my Valentine?” and remains visually prominent.

file_operations.description: Replace the current short `letterLines` content with a single cohesive heartfelt English letter totaling ~500 words (450–550 acceptable), while preserving the existing `letterLines.map(...)` reveal animation behavior and keeping the final `<h1>` text exactly “Will you be my Valentine?” (unchanged and prominent). Ensure any line breaks are represented as empty-string entries so spacing and animation cadence remain intact.
